name: You're The Boss (nobleteam)
description:
You are the boss. Your goal is to defend your loot that is contained in the chest. You will be able to defend your loot by launching enemies out of the map. Avoid taking damage from the enemies or else you may die. The game ends once you run out of health or the chest is left unguarded for too long and is reached by your enemies.

Controls:

-wasd is to move around

-left mouse button to use a ranged push attack

-right mouse button to use a force field attack
